reviewText:
A history of tea beginning 5,000 years ago.
The early years of growing tea in Charleston.
Iced tea and the 1904 St. Louis World's Fair.
A revolution in tea: the tea bag.
Growing, harvesting and producing tea.
Three types of tea from the same leaf.
How to make a perfect cup of tea.
Tea and your health.
Charleston Tea Plantation - a very special place on Wadmalaw Island in the Heart of South Carolina's Lowcountry.
